Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 132nd/Langley
ShortDescription: NB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Langley, 131st, Ellis, 130th, Eberhart, due to, street blockage, near 132nd/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Langley, 131st, Ellis, 130th, and Eberhart, due to, street blockage, near 132nd/Langley.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
